channel.title: Training a Skill and Making Crackers Work
channel.description:
Okay, well, I know how to add an object, but how do i make it so when you click on it, it gives you exp in a skill? Try to be kinda specific dont just say "Add a case" or something like that. Thanks :)
EDIT:
Also..christmas crackers only give you 1gp, how do i fix it? :P
LASTLY...
How do i change the max amount of money/items? :P Thanks guys, lol. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 12:49:16 PM[/size][hr]anybody? o.O (sorry about the double post :()
